name: Biggest Drone Sales Forever
description: Users can buy drones from here. Firebase and Admin route implemented. Users can add a review to the website and delete their orders. Admin can delete services, orders and make others admin.
beAdmin: To be Admin Login with this information Email: admin@admin.com Password: 123456
tech: Tailwind CSS, React, Node, Express, MongoDB, Firebase, React Hook form, Private Route Context API.

name: Book Your services For  Travelling
description: Users can book travel services. Users can order services and check their orders can add or remove any services. Users cannot check details and do orders without a login.
tech: Tailwind CSS, React, Node, Express, MongoDB, Firebase.

name: Shop your favourite item
description: User can see products from this wesite they can check faq if indeed bootstrap was used . Your dream store is here.
tech: Bootstrap, React, Firebase, Context API, React Router.
